elements.title: ARK Fjordur
elements.description: Explore a cold and hostile Norse-inspired archipelago in ARK's newest official community map, featuring four new creatures for you to tame! Fjordur contains over 140 square kilometers of new biomes, new challenges, and rewarding discoveries!

elements.title: ARK Lost Island
elements.description: Explore the soaring heights and hidden depths of ARK's newest official community map, featuring three new creatures for you to tame! Lost Island boasts 150 square kilometers of new biomes, challenges, and mysterious ruins!

elements.title: ARK: Ultimate Survivor Edition
elements.description: Experience everything that the ARK franchise has to offer in this definitive collection, with thousands of hours of unique content! Tame and ride primeval beasts, explore savage lands, and dive into the ultimate dinosaur-filled adventure together!

elements.title: ARK Crystal Isles
elements.description: Crystal Isles is 150 square kilometers of awe-inspiring biomes. Build bases high in forest canopy and floating islands, and tame your own Tropeognathus—ARK’s newest pterosaur—to ride into aerial combat!
elements.longDescription: Celebrate the return of an ARK community classic, updated with a new real-world dinosaur for you to tame, and now added to ARK’s Official Server networks! Crystal Isles is 150 square kilometers of colorful scenery and awe-inspiring biomes teeming with life.

elements.title: ARK Genesis Season Pass
elements.description: Continue your quest for survival and unlock the next chapter in the saga of ARK: Survival Evolved with the ARK: Genesis Season Pass! Two new huge expansions: ARK: Genesis Part 1, ARK: Genesis Part 2 and one exclusive in-game robotic AI companion.
elements.longDescription: Unlock a whole new chapter in ARK: Survival Evolved! This Season Pass gives access to two huge expansion packs that further the ARK storyline while adventuring through exotic new worlds with your robotic AI companion HLN-A’ in all-new mission-based gameplay.

elements.title: ARK Ragnarok
elements.description: Journey through an expansive 144 sq. kilometer environment where elements from The Island, Scorched Earth, and all new biomes are combined to bring the ultimate survivor experience.
elements.longDescription: Journey through an expansive 144 sq. kilometer environment where elements from The Island, Scorched Earth, and all new biomes are combined to bring the ultimate survivor experience.

elements.title: ARK Season Pass
elements.description: The ARK: Survival Evolved Season Pass gives you access to three huge expansion packs - Scorched Earth (available now), Aberration (available now), and Extinction (available now)!
elements.longDescription: The ARK: Survival Evolved Season Pass gives you access to three huge expansion packs: ARK: Scorched Earth, ARK: Aberration and ARK Extinction. Owning the base game is required in order to play.

elements.title: ARK The Center
elements.description: The Center is a free add-on for ARK: Survival Evolved that includes a massive new map for survivors to explore, nearly double the size of the playable geography of the standard ARK Island landscape making it about 70 sq. kilometers.
elements.longDescription: The Center is a free add-on for ARK: Survival Evolved that includes a massive new map for survivors to explore, nearly double the size of the playable geography of the standard ARK Island landscape making it about 70 sq. kilometers.

elements.title: ARK Valguero
elements.description: Survivors, come explore a vast and diverse 63 km map with a multitude of new land to build on! Witness familiar ARK creatures in an expansive environment and meet, Deinonychus, ARK’s newest feathered theropod, found only in Valguero.
elements.longDescription: Survivors, come explore a vast and diverse 63 km map with a multitude of new land to build on! Witness familiar ARK creatures in an expansive environment and meet, Deinonychus, ARK’s newest feathered theropod, found only in Valguero.

elements.title: ARK: Survival Evolved
elements.description: Stranded on the shores of a mysterious island, you must learn to survive. Use your cunning to kill or tame the primeval creatures roaming the land, and encounter other players to survive, dominate... and escape!

elements.title: ARK ModKit (UE4)
elements.description: Create your own ARK: Survival Evolved Mods to share with fellow survivors! The ARK Dev Kit is a streamlined version of the Unreal Engine 4 Editor that simplifies the creation and sharing process for ARK: Survival Evolved.
